name: Arcane-Monitor
description: Arcane Monitor is a tool designed to track high-potential stocks in real-time.

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=true DATA=false BOUNCE=true forceUpdate=false electron .
scripts.package: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=false DATA=false BOUNCE=true forceUpdate=false electron-packager . Arcane-Monitor --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out=dist --overwrite
scripts.package-all: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=false BOUNCE=true DATA=false forceUpdate=false electron-packager . Arcane-Monitor --all --out=dist --overwrite
scripts.package-mac: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=false BOUNCE=true DATA=false forceUpdate=false electron-packager . Arcane-Monitor --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --out=dist --overwrite
scripts.package-linux: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=false BOUNCE=true DATA=false forceUpdate=false electron-packager . Arcane-Monitor --platform=linux --arch=x64 --out=dist --overwrite
scripts.publish: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=false BOUNCE=true DATA=false forceUpdate=false electron-builder -p always
